Source.Name: fs-uae-arcade-dev
Source.Summary: Arcade Frontend for FS-UAE Amiga Emulator (Development Version).
Source.Description: An easy-to-use graphical configuration program which allows you to enjoy FS-UAE and Amiga emulation without writing configuration files.
